text: This is a list of the 564 municipalities in the U.S. state of New Jersey, ordered by population. There are five types of municipality in the state: * boroughs (253) * cities (52) * towns (15) * townships (240) * villages (4) New Jersey covers . That makes the average land size of a municipality in the state about . However, but note in the map at right that the sizes are very different. All land within New Jersey is in a municipality. ==List of municipalities== SkylineNewarkMilitaryParkBroadStreet.jpg|Newark, New Jersey's largest city by population Jersey City Skyline 2023 150
